title: .NET MAUI iOS SKPaint crash
body:
Hi I'm getting this crash when trying to use a library that uses SKIA on iOS .NET MAUI. The funny thing is that it works in the emulator but not on a real device. The same for the example project. it can be found here: https://github.com/iniceice88/OxyPlot.Maui.Skia.  I have built a release build since I saw one post claiming you need to build it in release mode for the DLL to show up. However nothing works, it works good on android and iOS simulator but not on a real IOS device. Does anyone know what is causing this to not find the DLL. I have debugged and now its not the libraries fault. Its when it tries to create a new SKPaint object that it crashes. I have tried different versions also and I tried downgrading to .NET 6 etc:
I'm using nuget: SkiaSharp.HarfBuzz version  2.88.3 and SkiaSharp.Views.Maui.Controls version 2.88.3
